body_content.explanation: a period of gradually more gentle exercise that is done after energetic exercise, to help your body recover:
examples: I do ten minutes of warming up and stretches, then a 45-minute workout followed by a 10-minute cooldown.
Each class will include a warm-up and a cool-down.

body_content.explanation: a fall in temperature of the weather or of a person or thing, after being very hot:
examples: Typically, the month of October brings a steep cooldown.
By the time the pizza came out of the oven I was starving, and the smell during the cool-down was torture.

body_content.explanation: a fall in the amount of activity involved in something:
examples: There has been a cooldown in media interest around the scandal.
Times could get very tough if the cool-down in the economy becomes a full-blown recession.

body_content.explanation: in video games, a period after using an ability, object, etc. during which a player has to wait before using it again:
examples: Some games have cooldowns for different sets of moves as well as individual moves.
This ultimate power has a longer cooldown compared to some basic attacks.
